<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get minimum referrals needed for custom link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/user/{id}/referrals/userRules/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves the minimum number of referrals required for a user to obtain a custom link, based on their subscription plan.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"id","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
